therapeuticskeleton
Class Skeleton

java.lang.Object
  therapeuticskeleton.Skeleton

public class Skeleton
extends java.lang.Object

Skeleton represents a humanoid skeleton in 3d space that is tracked by Microsoft Kinect/Primensense sensor, openNI driver and SimpleOpenNI Java Library. As a primary difference to the build-in skeleton data of OpenNI, this Skeleton takes the anatomical viewpoint for left/right labeling of body parts.
Skeleton provides basic calculations on joint position and angles. It provides access to joint and limb vectors. Skeleton is meant as Processing middleware library for therapeutic purposes. For neurologic therapy, mirroring of body sides is available. Detection of certain body posture and gestures is implemented. See classes SkeletonPosture and SkeletonGesture for details. Classes in this package (therapeuticskeleton) are not meant to be used alone. Please contact me, if you want to know more or are willing to work on this project. (thschuel@uos.de)

Constructor Detail

Skeleton

public Skeleton(SimpleOpenNI.SimpleOpenNI _kinect,
                int _userId,
                boolean _fullBodyTracking)
Constructor for the Skeleton.

Parameters:
_kinect - Handle to the SimpleOpenNI object. Skeleton will maintain its status in the update method by talking to SimpleOpenNI directly.
_userId - the user ID of the skeleton
_fullBodyTracking - switches full body tracking on/off. If switched off, only upper body joints will be evaluated
Method Detail

update

public void update(int _frameCount,
                   float _frameRate)
Update method. Call it to update status of skeleton. Skeleton will talk to SimpleOpenNI directly and will do all the necessary math for updating its status according to set up

Parameters:
_frameCount - the current frame of PApplet, used for statistics
_frameRate - the current frame rate of PApplet, used for statistics

setMirrorTherapy

public void setMirrorTherapy(short _mirrorTherapy)
Setter for mirror therapy modus. Sets the skeleton to mirror one body side to the other. When mirrorTherapy is set on, mirrorPlane will be calculated

Parameters:
_mirrorTherapy - short corresponding to Skeleton constants. If out of range, mirror therapy mode will be switched off

getMirrorTherapy

public short getMirrorTherapy()
Getter for mirror therapy modus.

Returns:
short mirror therapy modus corresponding to Skeleton constants

setFullBodyTracking

public void setFullBodyTracking(boolean _fullBodyTracking)
Setter for fullBodyTracking. If full body tracking is switched off, only upper body joints will be evaluated.

Parameters:
_fullBodyTracking - switch full body tracking on/off

getFullBodyTracking

public boolean getFullBodyTracking()
Getter for full body tracking.

Returns:
true if full body tracking is switched on

setEvaluateStatistics

public void setEvaluateStatistics(boolean _evaluateStatistics,
                                  java.io.BufferedWriter _buffer)
Setter for evaluating statistics for the skeleton. If switched on, statistics will be updated If was switched on before, new statistics object will be generated! Old statistics will be lost.

Parameters:
_evaluateStatistics - switch to set evaluating statistics on/off
_buffer - the file buffer to which statistics will be written. if null, statistics will not be logged

getEvaluateStatistics

public boolean getEvaluateStatistics()
Getter for evaluating statistics for the skeleton.

Returns:
boolean of evaluateStatistics-switch

setEvaluatePostureAndGesture

public void setEvaluatePostureAndGesture(boolean _evaluatePostureAndGesture)
Setter for evaluating posture and gesture for the skeleton. If switched on, posture and gesture will be updated

Parameters:
_evaluatePostureAndGesture - switch to set evaluating posture and gesture on/off

getEvaluatePostureAndGesture

public boolean getEvaluatePostureAndGesture()
Getter for evaluating posture and gesture for the skeleton.

Returns:
boolean of evaluatePostureAndGesture-switch

isUpdated

public boolean isUpdated()
Getter for status of the skeleton. Is used as a lock, methods of skeleton will return unsafe values, as long update function is not done.

Returns:
true if the status of the skeleton is fully updated

getUserId

public int getUserId()
Getter for user ID of the skeleton.

Returns:
the user ID of the skeleton

setGestureTolerance

public void setGestureTolerance(float _gestureTolerance)
Setter for the tolerance with which gesture will be detected. 0..1f.

Parameters:
_gestureTolerance - the tolerance between 0..1f. when higher than 1 or lower than 0, default tolerance 0.5f will be set

getGestureTolerance

public float getGestureTolerance()
Getter for gesture tolerance

Returns:
the gesture tolerance or -1f if gesture evaluation is not activated

setPostureTolerance

public void setPostureTolerance(float _postureTolerance)
Setter for the tolerance with which posture will be detected. 0..1f.

Parameters:
_postureTolerance - the tolerance between 0..1f. when higher than 1 or lower than 0, default tolerance 0.3f will be set

getPostureTolerance

public float getPostureTolerance()
Getter for posture tolerance

Returns:
the posture tolerance or -1f if posture evaluation is not activated

getLiveStatistics

public SkeletonStatistics getLiveStatistics()
Getter for SkeletonStatistics. The whole class object is returned to be displayed in the main applet. This getter provides access to the updated statistics object.

Returns:
the skeleton statistics object, null if statistics evaluation is switched off

getFinalStatistics

public SkeletonStatistics getFinalStatistics()
Getter for SkeletonStatistics. The whole class object is returned to be displayed in the main applet. This getter returns a copy of the statistics object that is not linked to a skeleton object and won't be further updated.

Returns:
a copy of the skeleton statistics object, null if statistics evluation is switched off

getJoint

public processing.core.PVector getJoint(short jointType)
This method returns the joint position of a certain joint in the global coordinate system

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint in the global coordinate system as vector. If jointType out of range: 0-vector

getJointUnmirrored

public processing.core.PVector getJointUnmirrored(short jointType)
This method returns the joint position of a certain joint in the global coordinate system. This method returns the unmirrored information, regardless of mirror therapy mode.

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint in the global coordinate system as vector. If jointType out of range: 0-vector

getJointProjective

public processing.core.PVector getJointProjective(short jointType)
This method returns the joint position of a certain joint on the kinect's projective plane. Z-value will be 0

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint as vector on the projective plane of the kinect. If jointType out of range: 0-vector

getJointLCS

public processing.core.PVector getJointLCS(short jointType)
The positions of the joints are transformed to the local coordinate system of the skeleton if calculateLocalCoordSys was set. This method returns the joint position of a certain joint in the local coordinate system. Works only if localCoordSysCalculated is true.

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint in the local coordinate system as vector. If jointType out of range or if localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getJointLCSUnmirrored

public processing.core.PVector getJointLCSUnmirrored(short jointType)
The positions of the joints are transformed to the local coordinate system of the skeleton if calculateLocalCoordSys was set. This method returns the unmirrored information, regardless of mirror therapy mode. This method returns the joint position of a certain joint in the local coordinate system. Works only if localCoordSysCalculated is true.

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint in the local coordinate system as vector. If jointType out of range or if localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getJointConfidence

public float getJointConfidence(short jointType)
The positions of the joints are evaluated with a certain confidence value. This method returns the confidence value for a certain joint

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The confidence value of a certain joint. Between 0f and 1f. If jointType out of range: 0f

Parameters:

Returns:
The confidence value of a certain joint. Between 0f and 1f. If jointType out of range: 0f

the distance in mm, magnitude of skeletons torso vector

getLeftUpperArmLCSUnmirrored

public processing.core.PVector getLeftUpperArmLCSUnmirrored()
The vectors for the lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience. This method returns the unmirrored arm vectors.

Returns:
The vector for the left upper arm in the local coordinate system.

                          short joint12)

joint12 - the joint the limb-vector origins in

getRVectorSagittalPlane

public processing.core.PVector getRVectorSagittalPlane()
All planes are defined in HNF: r*n0-d = 0. Sagittal Plane is mirror plane!

Returns:
the r vector of the sagittal body plane.

getCurrentUpperBodyPosture

public short getCurrentUpperBodyPosture()
Returns the posture of the skeleton, if calculation is activated and posture was evaluated in last update cycle. See class SkeletonPosture for details

Returns:
current upper body posture. short, constants of SkeletonPosture class, NO_POSE if posture is not calculated

getLastUpperBodyGesture

public short getLastUpperBodyGesture(int _lookAtPastFrames)
Returns the last gesture evaluated within _lookAtPastFrames, if calculation is activated and gesture was evaluated in last update cycle. See SkeletonGestures class for details

Parameters:
_lookAtPastFrames - the number of past update cycles during which the gesture should have been recognized.
Returns:
current upper body gesture. short, constants of SkeletonGestures class, NO_GESTURE if no gesture was recognized in the given past update cycles or gesture evaluation is switched off
